title: sakrecoer
author: sakrecoer
content: Cheng Wang is the guest of Son Of A Tech in one of the latest episodes.He talked about Alephium, the tech behind it (stateful UTXO, Proof or Less Work, and Blockflow), and the road ahead after the Leman Network Update.Check it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UzqZ4npA2w4
